itunes:title: September Books on the Radar
title: September Books on the Radar
description:
In Episode 67 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share a few of their anticipated August Releases. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and answer each other's "how do you feel about.." questions

**If you enjoy our commercial free podcast please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, + our ALL NEW CRIMINALLY BOOKED! Plus, we host fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
2:17 Lumify Eye Drops (T)
4:01 The Daily Horoscope App (R)

Latest Reads
7:56 The Attic Child | Lola Jaye (T) ðŸŽ§
11:26 The Lincoln Highway | Amor Towles (R) ðŸŽ§
19:28 Listener Latest Read - Tina @tschinstock - The Secret Life of Albert Entwistle |Matt Cain
19:58 All the Lonely People | Mike Gayle


20:24 Book Talk
21:28 Thank You for Listening | Julia Whelan
21:54 Do Not Become Alarmed | Maile Meloy **corrected title & author
31:59 The Most Likely Club | Elyssa Friedland (T)
34:50 Fairy Tale |Stephen King (R)
Billy Summers & 11/22/63 | Stephen King
37:37 How Not to Drown in a Glass of Water | Angie Cruz (T)
39:39 The Gospel of Wellness |Rina Raphael (R)
43:10 The Complicities (Stacey D'Erasmo) (T)
45:15 The Other Side of Night |Adam Hamdy (R)
47:17 House of Hunger | Alexis Henderson (T)
48:57 Shrines of Gaiety | Kate Atkinson (R)

Current Reads
50:49 Girls with Bright Futures |Tracy Dobmeier & Wendy Katzman (T)
51:00Â Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow | Gabrielle Zevin (R) ðŸŽ§

*The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!
